Class gjt.ImageScroller 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Component

                   +----java.awt.Panel
                           |
                           +----gjt.Scroller
                                   |
                                   +----gjt.ImageScroller
public class ImageScroller
extends Scroller
An extension of Scroller that smoothly scrolls an Image.

An Image must be supplied at construction time. The image may be reset any time after construction.

See Also:
Scroller, ImageCanvas, ScrollerTest

getScrollAreaSize()
